tasks.label: Setup EEG Pain Classification Project
args:
print('EEG Pain Classification Project Setup Complete!

Next Steps:
1. Download OSF dataset: https://osf.io/bsv86/
2. Place data in data/raw/ folder
3. Run: python scripts/preprocess_data.py --data_dir data/raw
4. Run: python scripts/train_model.py
5. Test real-time: python scripts/real_time_predict.py --simulate')
